Introduction

  • Forest in autumn
  • Forest in winter
  • Forest in spring
  • Forest in summer
Results of the 2014 IKEA competition
Learn more

Dear Visitors!

We are an enthusiastic, nature-lover and also hard-working company including teachers and students.

We try to eat up the topic of this competition ”At Home in the Forest” - declared by IKEA and Hungarian Society for Environmental Education - with our project, and during the procession of this task, we gain new experiences and knowledge. At this time our mental skills advancing, and we learn the technique how to work in a cooperative way. We try to present the topic we need to process in the most effective way we can. We make an attempt to make our project more enjoyable with various and periodic tasks, and last but not least our team would like to demonstrate the whole project from another side – and more scientific as well. It is a great pleasure for us to put it into practical in a joyous and purposive medium.

What is our goal?

On the one hand we would like to foment the protection of the mother-nature with this project but on the other hand – as our competitors wants to as well – our final goal is to win. Moreover – in the name of our volunteers – we would like to confute that wrong theory which says Information Technology and nature-lover attitude cannot fit side by side. Either we win or not we are (and will be) happy, because with clear conscience will retire to bed at night, namely the goal wherefore we work is one of the finest. Whatever will be the final result of the competition we made a beautiful, useful, memorable and also abiding one.
